avSummary: great 397, high 22, greater 19, loud 9, greatest 9, elder 8, great man 8, mighty 7, eldest 6, misc 44
definition:
adj
 1) great
    1a) large (in magnitude and extent)
    1b) in number
    1c) in intensity
    1d) loud (in sound)
    1e) older (in age)
    1f) in importance
        1f1) important things
        1f2) great, distinguished (of men)
        1f3) God Himself (of God)

 subst
    1g) great things
    1h) haughty things
    1i) greatness

 n pr m
    1j) (CLBL) Haggedolim, the great man?, father of Zabdiel
